Summary Note:
The RM is Luna Jasmijn Veenhoven's brother-in-law, having married her's sister. This family connection has strengthened their professional collaboration, allowing for seamless communication and trust.
Having worked for over 30 years, Luna Jasmijn Veenhoven brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
She decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Luna Jasmijn Veenhoven is currently single. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
Luna received her secondary school diploma from Meerwaert College Weesp in 1988.
Luna completed her university education at NWO - Netherlands Organisation for Scientific Research in 1994.
Occupation History:
Luna Jasmijn Veenhoven is a seasoned professional with over 30 years of experience.
At AkzoNobel N.V., Luna Jasmijn Veenhoven held the position of Plant Manager from 1995 to 2000, developing essential skills in the field.
Her subsequent role was as a Operations Director at Unilever N.V., where she continued to grow professionally from 2001 to 2006.
She spent 5 years working as a CEO at AkzoNobel N.V., refining her expertise and building a strong network.
In 2013, she transitioned to Heineken N.V. to take on the position of Chairman, capitalizing on her expertise to propel business growth.
She has been a Conglomerate Owner at Royal Dutch Shell plc since 2018, consistently demonstrating her ability to adapt, innovate, and thrive in an ever-changing environment.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 580000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
She has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 5150000 EUR.

She inherited 2660000 EUR from her grandfather, a well-known Oil and Gas Executive, in 2008, allowing her to expand her investment portfolio.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
